LanguageData.PlanetaryFortress.label: Planetary Fortress
LanguageData.PlanetaryFortress.description: A strong defensive fortress equipped with the "Twin Ibiks Cannon. Can be redeployed after installation of SRTS engine. All battery capacity will be emptied when using SRTS engine for safety reasons.
LanguageData.PlanetaryFortress_Blueprint.label: Planetary Fortress (blueprint)
LanguageData.PlanetaryFortress_Frame.label: Planetary Fortress (building)
LanguageData.PlanetaryFortress_Frame.description: A strong defensive fortress equipped with the "Twin Ibiks Cannon. Can be redeployed after installation of SRTS engine. All battery capacity will be emptied when using SRTS engine for safety reasons.
